title: Workout
brief_description: Jane Fonda’s Workout is the original VHS workout program. The program includes a 30 minute beginners’ class and a 60 minute advanced session. Fond would go on to release 23 different home workout videos and sell more than 17 million copies.

constellations_other.name: Technology and work
constellations_other.description: How does the godfather of animation and sprocket technology connect to Jane Fonda workout videos and a Jesus biopic?

description: Jane Fonda’s Workout is the original VHS workout program, inspired by her best-selling book. The program includes a 30-minute beginners’ class and a 60-minute advanced session. Fonda would go on to release 23 different home workout videos and sell more than 17 million copies.
description_for_label: Jane Fonda’s Workout is the original VHS workout program, inspired by her best-selling book. The program includes a 30-minute beginners’ class and a 60-minute advanced session. Fonda would go on to release 23 different home workout videos and sell more than 17 million copies.
